text: The Commissioner shall establish a process whereby licensees may challenge information entered into the NMLSR by the Commissioner.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-38, see notes following ยง 26-1101.

Miscellaneous Notes

Section 3 of D.C. Law 18-38 provides:

"Sec. 3. Applicability.

"Except for section 2(c)(1), (g), (j), and (o), this act shall not apply until the Commissioner of the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking has promulgated rules implementing this act."

heading.catch_text: Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry information challenge process.
